00021 #ifndef FILE_H_
00022 #define FILE_H_
00023 
00024 #include "Object.h"
00025 #include "String.h"
00026 #include "Iterator.h"
00027 #include "Iterable.h"
00028

00047 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00048 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00049 
00053 class File : public virtual Object {
00054 public:
00055 
00056     class iterator : public BidirectionalIterator<String, iterator> {
00057     friend class File;
00058     public:
00059         typedef BidirectionalIterator<String,iterator> super;
00060         iterator(bool begin = false, const File* obj = null);
00061         iterator(bool begin = false, File* obj = null);
00062 
00063         reference current() const {
00064             return cur;
00065         }
00066         void next() const;
00067         bool hasNext() const;
00068 
00069         bool equals(const iterator& other) const {
00070             return file == other.file && cur == other.cur && pos == other.pos;
00071         }
00072 
00073         iterator(const iterator& other) {
00074             file = other.file;
00075             cur = other.cur;
00076             pos = other.pos;
00077         }
00078         bool hasPrevious() const;
00079         void previous() const;
00080     private:
00081         File * file;
00082         mutable String cur;
00083         mutable idx_t pos;
00084     };
00085 
00086     S_ITERABLE(String)
00087 public:
00088 
00089     File() {
00090     }
00091 
00092     File(const String s) {
00093         operator/=(s);
00094     }
00095     File(const char* s) {
00096         operator/=(String(s));
00097     }
00098 
00099     ~File() {
00100     }
00101 
00102     File & removeFilename();
00103     File & replaceExtension(const String newExt = String());
00104 
00105     const String toString() const {
00106         return path;
00107     }
00108 
00109     // file_string
00110     const String nativeString() const;
00111 
00112     File rootPath() const;
00113     String rootName() const;
00114     String rootDirectory() const;
00115     File relativePath() const;
00116     File parent() const;
00117     String filename() const;
00118     String stem() const;
00119     String extension() const;
00120 
00121     bool empty() const {
00122         return path == "";
00123     }
00124     bool complete() const;
00125     bool hasRootPath() const;
00126     bool hasRootName() const;
00127     bool hasRootDirectory() const;
00128 
00129     bool hasRelativePath() const {
00130         return !relativePath().empty();
00131     }
00132 
00133     bool hasFilename() const {
00134         return path != "";
00135     }
00136 
00137     bool hasParent() const {
00138         return !parent().empty();
00139     }
00140 
00141     File & operator=(const String s) {
00142         path = "";
00143         operator/=(s);
00144         return *this;
00145     }
00146 
00147     File & operator/=(const File & rhs) {
00148         return operator /=(rhs.toString());
00149     }
00150 
00151     File & operator/=(const String);
00152 
00153 private:
00154     void appendSeparatorIfNeeded();
00155     void append(uchar c);
00156 
00157     String path;
00158 };
00159 
00160 bool operator==(const File& lhs, const File& rhs);
00161 bool operator<(const File& lhs, const File& rhs);
00162 inline File operator/(const File& lhs, const File& rhs) {
00163     return File(lhs) /= rhs;
00164 }
00165 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& lhs, const File& rhs) {
00166     return lhs << rhs.toString();
00167 }

00169 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE

00171 #endif  /* FILE_H_ */
